attributes.action: disability discrimination to have the same power as the race discrimination act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The disabled are not in the media in a compulsory way but the minorities are.
Disability needs to be seen in a more positive light and just as every soap and tv programme has a minority so it too should have a disabled person after all their are 6 million of us.
